DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of BMS-562086 on small bowel and colonic transits in female subjects with diarrhea-predominant irritable bowel syndrome (D-IBS)
DOC.brief_title: A Study of BMS-562086 in Patients With Irritable Bowel Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Female subjects with DIBS symptoms based on Rome II criteria and the subject's responses to the Bowel Disease Questionnaire Clinically significant prolonged diarrhea with dehydration requiring IV fluid within 60 days prior to baseline visit
